content: rib pattern weave in all ends left mitt cast on 44 sts arrange sts onto 3 needles and join in the round be careful not to twist sts work 12 rounds of p1 k2 p1 pattern begin mitt round 1 k17 row 1 pattern k16 round 2 k17 row 2 pattern k16 round 3 k17 row 3 pattern k16 round 4 k17 row 4 pattern k16 round 5 k17 row 5 pattern k16 round 6 k8 pm m1 k1 m1 pm k8 row 6 pattern k16 round 7 k19 row 7 pattern k16 round 8 k19 row 8 pattern k16 round 9 k8 pm m1 k3 m1 pm k8 row 1 pattern k16 round 10 k21 row 2 pattern k16 round 11 k21 row 3 pattern k16 round 12 k8 pm m1 k5 m1 pm k8 row 4 pattern k16 continue in this manner until there are 13 sts between the markers increasing 2 sts every 3 rounds through round 21 round 22 k8 place next 13 sts on waste yarn cast on 1 st using the backward loop cast on k8 row 6 pattern k16 round 23 k17 row 7 pattern k16 round 24 k17 row 8 pattern k16 continue in this manner for 1 more repeat of the braided cable pattern work 6 rounds of p1 k2 p1 rib cast off loosely in the rib pattern thumb o put the 13 sts from the waste yarn onto 3 dpn s attach new yarn pick up and knit 3 sts in the space between the thumb and palm knit the 13 sts just placed on the dpn s that completes one round o work 6 rounds of k2 p2 rib o cast off loosely in the rib pattern weave in all ends ©copyright held by tera johnson for personal use only not to be posted to any other website without the designer s permission
